Package mil.navy.nrl.cmf.sousa.idol

IDOL, the Interactive Distributed Object Library, is a collection of Entity classes implemented using the SOUSA framework.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
Console.CommandHandler CommandHandler interprets command strings
 

Class Summary
Console Console reads lines from System.in and delegates their interpretation to a CommandHandler.
IdolInitializer IdolInitializer configures an agent's state and provides a simple ControlLogic that permits the setting and inspecting of the Entity's state on the console.
IdolInitializer.Console_ControlLogic Basic ControlLogic with command console support.
 

Package mil.navy.nrl.cmf.sousa.idol Description

IDOL, the Interactive Distributed Object Library, is a collection of Entity classes implemented using the SOUSA framework. There are two kinds of Entities: user and service. Service Entities do work for user Entities. User Entities represent a person or a process that needs services. Each kind of Entity is initialized using an IdolInitializer. The IdolInitializer uses a Properties object to automatically create and initialize the values of the Entity's State, set up the communications parameters, and create a console command interpreter.
